title: Nitya Kundan Stud Earrings - A Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Gold; High-quality Kundan diamonds; Natural Emerald center stone; Ruby accents. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricate openwork design with Kundan diamond setting; central Emerald with delicate Ruby accents on the edges. The design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian motifs, reinterpreted in a contemporary style for a modern woman. Secure screw-back closure for comfortable wear.
occasions: or as an elegant addition to your everyday wear. These studs will complement any outfit
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad. Features genuine gemstones and high-quality Kundan diamonds. The timeless design blends traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics, ensuring enduring style and value. The Emerald and Ruby accents add a touch of regal charm, while the Kundan detailing provides unmatched brilliance. These earrings are not just jewelry; they are a legacy.
